abstract: A rally in the Russian market ahead of the election shows that investors are confident Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin will win with enough legitimacy to avoid short-term political instability.
snippet: A rally in the Russian market ahead of the election shows that investors are confident Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin will win with enough legitimacy to avoid short-term political instability.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW — Five candidates are still campaigning in Russia’s presidential election, but investors in the country’s stock exchange seem to have already called the race.

headline.main: Russia’s Stock Investors Betting on Putin’s Re-election
headline.print_headline: Russia’s Stock Investors Betting on Putin’s Re-election
